summary.span: 提供 Microsoft Office Excel 的文档级项目中 Sheetn 类的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for the Sheet*n* classes in document-level projects for Microsoft Office Excel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是使用 Visual Studio 创建的文档`Sheet`级 Excel 项目中的 n 类的基类。 The class is the base class for the `Sheet`*n* classes in document-level Excel projects created by using Visual Studio. 使用 n 类以编程方式访问项目中的工作表。 `Sheet`Use the `Sheet`*n* classes to programmatically access the worksheets in your project. 类是表示文档级项目中的工作表的*主机项。* The class is a *host item* that represents a worksheet in document-level projects. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[主机项和主机控件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview)和[工作表主机项](/visualstudio/vsto/worksheet-host-item)。For more information, see [Host Items and Host Controls Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview) and [Worksheet Host Item](/visualstudio/vsto/worksheet-host-item). 该类提供与 Excel 主互操作程序集中的类相同的成员,但它添加了以下功能: The class provides the same members as the class in the Excel primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features: - 属性。 property. 使用此属性可以在运行时将托管控件添加到 Excel 工作表或删除控件。Use this property to add managed controls to an Excel worksheet, or to remove controls, at run time. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性可获取工作表宿主项的基础对象。Use this property to get the underlying object for a worksheet host item. - 方法。 method. 重写此方法以向工作表中的 VBA 代码公开项目中的类。Override this method to expose a class in your project to VBA code in the worksheet. - 文档级事件 (例如和), 仅在 Excel 对象模型中的应用程序级别提供。Document-level events, such as and , that are provided only at the application level in the Excel object model. 也就是说, 在 Excel 对象模型中, 这些事件是在类而不是类中定义的。That is, in the Excel object model, these events are defined in the class rather than the class. ## 创建工作表主机项Creating Worksheet Host Items 不能在 Office 项目中以编程方式创建对象。You cannot create objects programmatically in Office projects. 在文档级`Sheet`项目中, [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]当最终用户打开工作簿时, 将自动实例化*n*类 (派生自)。In document-level projects, the `Sheet`*n* classes (which derive from ) are instantiated automatically by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] when the end user opens the workbook. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations). 在应用程序级项目中, 您可以使用`GetVstoObject`方法以编程方式创建工作表宿主项。In application-level projects, you can create worksheet host items programmatically by using the `GetVstoObject` method. 你创建的工作表宿主项是一个对象, 而不是一个对象。The worksheet host item you create is a object, rather than a object. 有关更多信息，请参见 [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net4utilities](~/includes/vsto-net4utilities-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取一个表示工作表上一个或多个列的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that represents one or more columns on the worksheet.

value.span: 一个表示工作表上一个或多个列的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents one or more columns on the worksheet.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当未使用参数时, 此属性将返回一个对象, 该对象包含工作表中的所有列。When used without parameters, this property returns a object that contains all the columns on the worksheet. 此属性可与以下可选参数一起使用, 以获取工作表中的特定列。This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific columns on the worksheet. 如果将此属性与参数一起使用, 则返回值是必须强制转换为的对象。If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a . |参数Parameter|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|要获取的一个或多个列的索引。The index of one or more columns to get.

若要获取单列, 请将以下对象之一传递到此参数:To get a single column, pass one of the following objects to this parameter:

-一个整数, 它指定要获取的列的索引。- An integer that specifies the index of the column you want to get. 列索引从1开始。The column indexes begin at 1.
-一个字符串, 包含要获取的列的字母。- A string that consists of the letter of the column you want to get.

若要获取多个连续列, 请传递 "`first column letter`:`last column letter`" 格式的字符串。To get multiple contiguous columns, pass a string with the format "`first column letter`:`last column letter`". 例如, 若要获取 A 到 E 列, 请传递 "A:E"。For example, to get columns A through E, pass "A:E". **注意：** 此参数的名称是误导的;此参数指定要获取的列的索引, 而不是行的索引。**Note:** The name of this parameter is misleading; this parameter specifies the indexes of the columns you want to get, not the rows.| |`ColumnIndex`|不使用此参数。Do not use this parameter. 如果尝试向此参数传递值, 则此属性将引发。This property will throw a if you try to pass a value to this parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性设置工作表的第一列中所有单元格的字体的颜色、名称、大小和加粗程度。The following code example uses the property to set the color, name, size, and boldness of the font of all the cells in the first column on the worksheet. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. 若要运行此代码, 请将其复制到项目中的一个工作表类。To run this code, copy it into one of the worksheet classes in your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`false`时, 不会重新计算现有的条件格式。 When the property is set to `false`, existing conditional formats will not be re-evaluated. 所有以前应用的条件格式仍将可见, 但将不会更新为单元值或 AppliesTo 范围更改。Any previously applied conditional formatting will still be visible, but will not be updated as cell values or AppliesTo ranges are changed. 将此属性设置`true`为, 以在评估规则之前完全配置规则。Set this property to `true` to configure a rule completely before evaluating it. 如果应用条件的范围很大, 则这可能会提高性能。This can result in a performance increase if the range over which the condition is applied is large.

summary.span: 使用此方法可粘贴来自其他应用程序的数据或以特定格式粘贴数据。

span.span: Use this method to paste data from other applications or to paste data in a specific format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不知道要传递到 Format 参数的字符串, 可以通过在 Excel 中尝试 "粘贴" 命令, 查看与剪贴板上的数据兼容的字符串。If you do not know which string to pass to the Format parameter, you can view the strings that are compatible with the data on the Clipboard by trying the paste command in Excel . 将数据复制到剪贴板, 使用 Excel 中的 "**选择性粘贴**" 命令, 然后查看 "**选择性粘贴**" 对话框中列出的格式。Copy the data to the Clipboard, use the **Paste Special** command in Excel, and then view the formats listed in the **Paste Special** dialog box. `NoHTMLFormatting`仅在 = " `Format` HTML" 时才有意义。`NoHTMLFormatting` will only matter when `Format` = "HTML". 在所有其他情况下`NoHTMLFormatting` , 都将被忽略。In all other cases, `NoHTMLFormatting` will be ignored. 使用此方法之前, 必须选择目标范围。You must select the destination range before you use this method. 此方法可能会根据剪贴板的内容修改工作表选择。This method might modify the sheet selection, depending on the contents of the Clipboard. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 HTML 置于剪贴板上, 然后使用方法将剪贴板的内容粘贴到 A1 单元格。The following code example places HTML onto the Clipboard and then uses the method to paste the contents of the Clipboard into cell A1. 请注意, 该示例在调用方法之前选择范围。Note that the example selects the range before calling the method. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet#106](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet/CS/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet.cs#106)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet#106](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet/VB/Sheet1.vb#106)]

summary.span: 在对数据透视表内的单元格或单元格范围进行编辑或重新计算（针对包含公式的单元格）后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a cell or range of cells inside a PivotTable are edited or recalculated (for cells that contain formulas).

summary.span: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

span.span: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在编辑或重新计算单元格以外的任何情况下, 事件不会发生。The event does not occur under any conditions other than editing or recalculating cells. 例如, 如果对数据透视表进行刷新、排序、筛选或深化, 则不会发生这种情况, 即使这些操作移动单元格并且可能从 OLAP 数据源检索新值也是如此。For example, it will not occur when the PivotTable is refreshed, sorted, filtered, or drilled down on, even though those operations move cells and potentially retrieve new values from the OLAP data source. > [!NOTE] > 此事件显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 在 Excel 2007 项目中不能使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在将更改应用于数据透视表之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes are applied to a PivotTable.

summary.span: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

span.span: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在 Excel 执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句之前立即发生, 以将所有更改应用于数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源, 并在用户选择在用户界面中应用更改之后立即发生。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes an UPDATE CUBE statement to apply all changes to the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to apply changes in the user interface. > [!NOTE] > 此事件显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 在 Excel 2007 项目中不能使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在针对 OLAP 数据源提交数据透视表的更改之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes are committed against the OLAP data source for a PivotTable.

summary.span: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

span.span: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在 Excel 针对数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源执行 COMMIT TRANSACTION 之前发生, 并在用户选择保存整个数据透视表的更改之后立即发生。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes a COMMIT TRANSACTION against the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to save changes for the whole PivotTable. > [!NOTE] > 此事件显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 在 Excel 2007 项目中不能使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在放弃对数据透视表的更改之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes to a PivotTable are discarded.

summary.span: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

span.span: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事务仍处于活动状态, 则在 Excel 对 OLAP 数据源执行 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句之前立即发生, 然后在用户选择放弃更改后丢弃数据透视表中的所有编辑值。Occurs immediately before Excel executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP data source, if a transaction is still active, and then discards all edited values in the PivotTable, after the user has chosen to discard changes. > [!NOTE] > 此事件显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 在 Excel 2007 项目中不能使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在对数据透视表进行更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs after changes to a PivotTable.

summary.span: 此事件只能用于 [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] 项目中。

span.span: This event can be used only in [!INCLUDE[Excel_14_short](~/includes/excel-14-short-md.md)] projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对数据透视表进行大多数更改期间发生, 以便您可以编写代码来响应用户操作, 如清除、分组或刷新数据透视表中的项。The occurs during most changes to a PivotTable, so that you can write code to respond to user actions, such as clearing, grouping, or refreshing items in the PivotTable. > [!NOTE] > 此事件显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 在 Excel 2007 项目中不能使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

span.span: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 保护工作表使其无法修改。

span.span: Protects a worksheet so that it cannot be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此方法`UserInterfaceOnly`应用于参数设置为`true`的, 然后保存该工作簿, 则当您重新打开工作簿时, 整个工作表 (而不仅仅是界面) 都将完全受到保护。If you apply this method with the `UserInterfaceOnly` argument set to `true` and then save the workbook, the entire worksheet (not just the interface) will be fully protected when you reopen the workbook. 若要在打开工作簿后重新启用用户界面保护, 你必须再次将此方法`UserInterfaceOnly`应用到设置为。 `true`To re-enable the user interface protection after the workbook is opened, you must again apply this method with `UserInterfaceOnly` set to `true`. 如果提供密码, 则可以对受保护的工作表做出更改。It is possible to make changes to a protected worksheet if the password is supplied. 此外, 另一种方法是取消对工作表的保护, 进行必要的更改, 然后再次保护工作表。Also, another method would be to unprotect the worksheet, make the necessary changes, and then protect the worksheet again. > [!NOTE] > "未保护" 表示单元格可能被锁定 ("**设置单元格格式**" 对话框), 但包含在 "**允许用户编辑范围**" 对话框中定义的范围内, 并且用户已通过密码保护该范围或通过 NT 权限进行验证。'Unprotected' means the cell may be locked (**Format Cells** dialog) but is included in a range defined in the **Allow Users to Edit Ranges** dialog, and the user has unprotected the range with a password or been validated via NT permissions. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取属性的值, 以确定是否保护工作表的内容。The following code example gets the value of the property to determine whether the contents of the worksheet are protected. 如果内容未受保护, 则调用方法`Contents`并将参数设置为`true` , 以使内容受到保护。If the contents are unprotected, then the method is called with the `Contents` parameter set to `true` so that the contents are protected. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Cell1`|采用应用程序语言的以 A1 样式表示法表示的范围名称。The name of the range in A1-style notation in the language of the application. 范围名称可以包括范围运算符（冒号）、交集运算符（空格）或并集运算符（逗号）。It can include the range operator (a colon), the intersection operator (a space), or the union operator (a comma). 范围名称还可以包括货币符号，但是这些符号被忽略。It can also include dollar signs, but they are ignored. 可以在范围的任何部分中使用本地定义的名称。You can use a local defined name in any part of the range. 如果使用一个名称，则假定该名称使用的是应用程序的语言。If you use a name, the name is assumed to be in the language of the application. 此参数是必需的。This parameter is required.| |`Cell2`|范围右下角的单元格。The cell in the lower-right corner of the range. 可以是一个包含单个单元格、整列、整行的 ，或者可以是一个以应用程序的语言命名单个单元格的字符串。Can be a that contains a single cell, an entire column, an entire row, or it can be a string that names a single cell in the language of the application. 此参数在 Visual Basic 中是可选的。This parameter is optional in Visual Basic.| 如果尝试在不指定任何参数的情况下使用, 将获取属于 Visual Studio 基础结构的对象, 并且不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get a object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了使用属性访问单个或多个单元格的不同方法。The following code example demonstrates different ways to use the property to access a single cell or multiple cells. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet#42](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet/CS/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet.cs#42)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet#42](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkSheet/VB/Sheet1.vb#42)]

## Remarks 当未使用参数时, 此属性将返回一个对象, 该对象包含工作表中的所有行。When used without parameters, this property returns a object that contains all the rows on the worksheet. 此属性可与以下可选参数一起使用, 以获取工作表中的特定行。This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific rows on the worksheet. 如果将此属性与参数一起使用, 则返回值是必须强制转换为的对象。If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a . |参数Parameter|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|要获取的一个或多个行的索引。The index of one or more rows to get.

若要获取单个行, 请传递一个整数, 该整数指定要获取的行的索引。To get a single row, pass an integer that specifies the index of the row you want to get. 行索引从1开始。The row indexes begin at 1.

若要获取多个连续行, 请传递格式为 "`first row`:`last row`" 的字符串。To get multiple contiguous rows, pass a string with the format "`first row`:`last row`". 例如, 若要获取第1到5行, 请传递 "1:5"。For example, to get rows 1 through 5, pass "1:5".| |`ColumnIndex`|不使用此参数。Do not use this parameter. 如果尝试向此参数传递值, 则此属性将引发。This property will throw a if you try to pass a value to this parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性设置工作表的前五行中所有单元格的字体的颜色、名称、大小和加粗程度。The following code example uses the property to set the color, name, size, and boldness of the font of all the cells in the first five rows on the worksheet. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. 若要运行此代码, 请将其复制到项目中的一个工作表类。To run this code, copy it into one of the worksheet classes in your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 功能 (保存为 XML 电子表格格式的文件除外) 仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中提供。XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003. 如果 XPath 存在于 XML 列表中的某一列内, 则返回的对象不包含标题行或插入行。If the XPath exists within a column in an XML list, the object returned does not include the header row or the Insert row. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法获取映射到特定 XPath 的单元格的。The following code example uses the method to get the of cells mapped to a particular XPath. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization.
